item.title: Python Google Calendar - part 2
item.description: Google Calendar and Python - Part 2 Let’s get to the good stuff. Last time we set up everything we needed so that we could interact with the Google Calendar API. I wanted to use data from a Formspree email to create an event in my Google Calendar. To get the data, I ran the code from my file on github: if __name__ == "__main__": email_info = get_formspree_email_info() print(email) The result was:
